# tabStopType

**Instance Property**

The text tab’s type of tab stop.

## Declaration

```swift
var tabStopType: NSParagraphStyle.TextTabType { get }
```

## Discussion

Possible values are listed in [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSParagraphStyle/TextTabType].

## Deprecated

- **init(type:location:)**: Initializes a newly allocated text tab with the specified alignment and location.
